array.string: /bin/launchctl setenv AWS_CONFIG_FILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/aws/config" /bin/launchctl setenv AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/aws/credentials" /bin/launchctl setenv AZURE_CONFIG_DIR "$HOME/Library/Application Support/azure" /bin/launchctl setenv CALCHISTFILE "$HOME/Library/Caches/calc_history" /bin/launchctl setenv CARGO_HOME "$HOME/Library/Application Support/cargo" /bin/launchctl setenv COLIMA_HOME "$HOME/Library/Application Support/colima" /bin/launchctl setenv DOCKER_CONFIG "$HOME/Library/Application Support/docker" /bin/launchctl setenv ELM_HOME "$HOME/Library/Application Support/elm" /bin/launchctl setenv FFMPEG_DATADIR "$HOME/Library/Application Support/ffmpeg" /bin/launchctl setenv GDBHISTFILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/gdb/history" /bin/launchctl setenv GOMODCACHE "$HOME/Library/Caches/go/mod" /bin/launchctl setenv GOPATH "$HOME/Library/Application Support/go" /bin/launchctl setenv GOPASS_CONFIG "$HOME/Library/Application Support/gopass/config" /bin/launchctl setenv GRADLE_USER_HOME "$HOME/Library/Application Support/gradle" /bin/launchctl setenv HISTFILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/bash/history" /bin/launchctl setenv INPUTRC "$HOME/Library/Application Support/readline/inputrc" /bin/launchctl setenv IPFS_PATH "$HOME/Library/Application Support/ipfs" /bin/launchctl setenv JUPYTER_CONFIG_DIR "$HOME/Library/Application Support/jupyter" /bin/launchctl setenv JUPYTER_PLATFORM_DIRS "1" /bin/launchctl setenv JUPYTERLAB_DIR "$HOME/Library/Application Support/jupyter/lab" /bin/launchctl setenv K9SCONFIG "$HOME/Library/Application Support/k9s" /bin/launchctl setenv LEDGER_FILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/hledger.journal" /bin/launchctl setenv LIMA_HOME "$HOME/Library/Application Support/lima" /bin/launchctl setenv LYNX_CFG_PATH "$HOME/Library/Application Support/lynx.cfg" /bin/launchctl setenv MACHINE_STORAGE_PATH "$HOME/Library/Application Support/docker-machine" /bin/launchctl setenv MINIKUBE_HOME "$HOME/Library/Application Support/minikube" /bin/launchctl setenv MIX_XDG "true" /bin/launchctl setenv MOST_INITFILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/mostrc" /bin/launchctl setenv MYPY_CACHE_DIR "$HOME/Library/Caches/mypy" /bin/launchctl setenv MYSQL_HISTFILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/mysql_history" /bin/launchctl setenv NODE_REPL_HISTORY "$HOME/Library/Application Support/node_repl_history" /bin/launchctl setenv NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG "$HOME/Library/Application Support/npm/npmrc" /bin/launchctl setenv PASSWORD_STORE_DIR "$HOME/Library/Application Support/pass" /bin/launchctl setenv PGPASSFILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/pg/pgpass" /bin/launchctl setenv PROXYCHAINS_CONF_FILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/proxychains/proxychains.conf" /bin/launchctl setenv PSQL_HISTORY "$HOME/Library/Application Support/psql_history" /bin/launchctl setenv PSQLRC "$HOME/Library/Application Support/pg/psqlrc" /bin/launchctl setenv PYENV_ROOT "$HOME/Library/Application Support/pyenv" /bin/launchctl setenv PYLINTHOME "$HOME/Library/Caches/pylint" /bin/launchctl setenv PYTHON_EGG_CACHE "$HOME/Library/Caches/python-eggs" /bin/launchctl setenv PYTHON_HISTORY "$HOME/Library/Application Support/python/history" /bin/launchctl setenv PYTHONPYCACHEPREFIX "$HOME/Library/Caches/python" /bin/launchctl setenv PYTHONUSERBASE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/python" /bin/launchctl setenv REDISCLI_HISTFILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/redis/rediscli_history" /bin/launchctl setenv REDISCLI_RCFILE "$HOME/Library/Application Support/redis/redisclirc" /bin/launchctl setenv RIPGREP_CONFIG_PATH "$HOME/Library/Application Support/ripgrep/config" /bin/launchctl setenv RUFF_CACHE_DIR "$HOME/Library/Caches/ruff" /bin/launchctl setenv RUSTUP_HOME "$HOME/Library/Application Support/rustup" /bin/launchctl setenv SCREENRC "$HOME/Library/Application Support/screen/screenrc" /bin/launchctl setenv SDKMAN_DIR "$HOME/Library/Application Support/sdkman" /bin/launchctl setenv SQLITE_HISTORY "$HOME/Library/Application Support/sqlite_history" /bin/launchctl setenv STARSHIP_CACHE "$HOME/Library/Caches/starship" /bin/launchctl setenv STARSHIP_CONFIG "$HOME/Library/Application Support/starship.toml" /bin/launchctl setenv TERMINFO_DIRS "$HOME/Library/Application Support/terminfo:/usr/share/terminfo" /bin/launchctl setenv TERMINFO "$HOME/Library/Application Support/terminfo" /bin/launchctl setenv TEXMFCONFIG "$HOME/Library/Application Support/texlive/texmf-config" /bin/launchctl setenv TEXMFHOME "$HOME/Library/Application Support/texmf" /bin/launchctl setenv TEXMFVAR
